description: Recent patches and premium weapon tiers have some players excited and frustrated trying to sort out the new meta. In the meantime we’re just here to have fun with more community finds, items you shouldn’t sleep on, and more things you might have missed in Helldivers 2.
title: Helldivers 2 - 14 More Things I Wish I Knew

description:
The Cluckin' Bell Farm Raid in GTA Online can net you $500,000 following the completion of the heist. All of this cash is earned through stealing the cartel's cocaine at the chicken factory and returning it to Vincent.

As with any heist in GTA Online, you can complete the Cluckin' Bell Farm Raid over and over again (after a short cooldown). This means you have a concrete source of $500,000 as long as you keep completing the six missions in the heist. If you want to truly maximize your earnings potential with the Cluckin' Bell Farm Raid, though, you need to use some key strategies that allow you to finish the raid in under an hour.

Check out the guide below to see the fastest way to complete the raid.

Continue Reading
title: GTA Online - How To Make Money Fast In The Cluckin' Bell Raid

description:
Hot off Helldivers 2's success, Sony is now selling official merchandise inspired by the co-op shooter, including a mug perfect for sipping some Liber-tea.

In a Playstation Blog post announcing the new Helldivers 2 merchandise line, Grace Chen, vice president of network advertising, loyalty, and licensed merchandise at PlayStation, said more products will be coming in the next few months. Currently, the merch is available through the official PlayStation Gear shop, Amazon, and Insert Coin, as well as othe
title: Helldivers 2 Merch Means You Can Now Own A Real Cup Of Liber-Tea

description: The first post-launch Helldivers 2 Warbond is here. Warbonds are the hit co-op game's version of a battle pass and come in free and paid versions. The Cutting Edge Warbond, as this latest one is named, is the second paid battle pass and the first since launch day, giving the game's committed audience more metagame rewards to chase as they dodge alien bile and crush their friends with the game's best stratagems. Like the previous paid Warbond, the Cutting Edge Warbond includes a few dozen rewards spanning three pages in-game. That means things like new cosmetic-only items like armor styles and helmets are introduced, but also some gameplay-altering items in the strictly PvE game, such as new weapons and throwable
title: Helldivers 2 Cutting Edge Warbond - All Skins, Guns, And Rewards

description:
The Steam Spring Sale has started, which means it's time to sift through your wishlist and buy a bunch of games you may or may not play before the next big Steam sale. This time-honored tradition tends to be quite fun because so many games are on sale. But with literally thousands of game deals up for grabs, you may want some guidance. We've perused the offers to find the best Steam Spring Sale game deals. Steam's Spring Sale runs until March 21 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET, so you have a full week to make your picks.

It's possible we'll add to this if we unearth more gems, but for now we've highlighted over 25 games that are worth checking out. Though we've included games across a wide variety of genres, we stuck with a general theme here: games that have released within the last year. There i
title: Best Steam Spring Sale Game Deals

description:
Spring is upon us, so we should all go outside and smell some flowers or the sweet, sweet vent fumes of the Steam Deck on a sunny day. Totally kidding--you shouldn't huff fumes from any electronic. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't enjoy the warmer weather with your Steam Deck in tow. It's perfect timing, too, as Steam's Spring Sale is live now. We've rounded up over 25 of the best Steam Deck deals in Steam's Spring Sale.

All of the games on our list are either marked as verified/playable by Valve or GameSpot staff has personally tried the game on Deck and can vouch for its compatibility. For this list, we focused more on indie games that feel right at home on a handheld device. Most of these also have the added benefit of not draining your Steam Deck's battery in an hour or two. No one wants to go
title: Steam Spring Sale - Best Steam Deck Game Deals

description:
A new Dungeons & Dragons game set in the Forgotten Realms universe is coming from the creators of Disney Dreamlight Valley, publisher Gameloft has announced.

The title will be developed by Dreamlight Valley developer Gameloft Montreal, and is said to feature "unique, cooperative gameplay" that will combine elements of survival games, life-simulation titles like Dreamlight Valley, and action-RPG.

"Players can ex
title: A Dungeons & Dragons Life Sim Is Being Made By Disney Dreamlight Valley Devs

description:
Black Mirror, the eerie and unsettling futuristic sci-fi series that set the tone by having a man fornicate with a pig for its very first episode, is set to return with new episodes on Netflix in 2025. Series creator Charlie Brooker cooked up six new episodes for the seventh season.

Basically nothing is known about them, except for that one episode will be a sequel to the "USS Callister" episode. This Star Trek-inspired episode featured Jesse Plemons as a programmer of a video game who creates a scenario that becomes too real.

Whether or not Plemons will return is unknown. Black Mirror is known for its celebrity casts. Actors who have appeared in Black Mirror episodes over the years have included Bryce Dallas Howard, Jon Hamm, Anthony Mackie, Aaron Paul, Daniel Kaluuya, Josh Hartnett, Miley Cyrus, and Wyatt Russell.
title: Black Mirror Returns In 2025, And One Episode Is A Sequel

description:
Not even the creators of Apex Legends, EA's premier shooter, are safe from recent industry layoffs, with multiple members of the team confirming on social media that developer Respawn has been affected.

Though not personally let go, Respawn level designer Aaron Stump confirmed layoffs had hit the team in a post on X.

The Apex team was hit with layoffs today. It sucks seeing some of the people I've worked with for almost 3 years now get let go. Hopefully, they land on their feet sooner rather than later.

— Aaron (@AaronWStump) March 14, 2024

"The Apex team was hit with layoffs today," Stump said. "It sucks seeing some of t
title: Apex Legends Developer Respawn Hit By EA Layoffs

description:
Destiny 2's final season is also its longest, but players can look forward to new content before the arrival of The Final Shape expansion in June. Developer Bungie has officially announced that Into the Light will launch on April 9 alongside Update 7.3.6, adding new story content throughout April and May that paves the way for the final chapter in the Light and Darkness saga.

Beyond that, Bungie is keeping quiet on what players can expect to see, but the new key art for Into the Light does tease another showdown with The Hive, possibly in what appears to be the Midtown PvP map set inside of the Last City. The new update will also
title: Destiny 2: Into The Light Kicks Off In April With Two Months Of New Story Content

description:
Former Mandalorian star and MMA fighter Gina Carano told The Hollywood Reporter that she isn't backing down from her ongoing battle against her former employer, Disney. The actress, ousted from her role in The Mandalorian in 2021 due to controversial social media posts, described the sense of "disrespect" and "shame" she endured post-firing, emphasizing her determination to fight back with a wrongful termination lawsuit.

In a series of further contentious comments, Carano expressed her admiration for Elon Musk, who is financing her legal endeavor, telling The Hollywood Reporter, "I think it's pretty incredible what he is doing."

Carano's and Musk's paths crossed due to their re
title: Former Mandalorian Star Gina Carano Stands Firm Against Disney In Legal Battle

description:
During the "Hit and Run" mission of the GTA Online Cluckin' Bell Farm Raid, you have the chance to steal one of three getaway vehicles for the upcoming heist. These vehicles belong to the same factions from the previous mission, Concealed Weapons, where you had to steal different loadouts.

As you might expect, if you choose to steal a weapon from the same faction you stole a loadout from, they're going to be extra aggressive. However, you're not even told what vehicles are awaiting you when you arrive at a faction's location, so you won't know which one has the best possible getaway vehicle. Below, you can see what vehicle awaits at each faction, how to get it, and which one is the best to steal.

Getaway Vehicle A

First up, we have Poin
title: GTA Online Cluckin' Bell Farm Raid - All Getaway Vehicle Options

description: Despite an uninspired narrative, Unicorn Overlord impresses with gorgeous visuals and engrossing strategy action.
title: Unicorn Overlord Review

description:
The Epic Games Store continues to give away a free game each week, and this week is another nice find and the price can't be beat. Every Thursday at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, Epic offers at least one free PC game (and sometimes even as many as two to three). All you need to do to claim the free games is create a free Epic account and enable two-factor authentication to start snagging freebies. You have a week to add the freebies to your library before the new one(s) take their place. At this point, Epic has given away hundreds of free games, and there's no sign that the program will stop any time soon. We keep this article up to date weekly to highlight both the current free games and next week's offerings.

Current free game at Epic
title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided Is Free To Claim This Week On The Epic Games Store

description:
Director Patty Jenkins' much-anticipated Star Wars project, Rogue Squadron, may be seeing new life after recent setbacks. Initially slated for a December 2023 release, the film was removed from Disney's schedule in September 2022, sparking speculation about its future. However, Jenkins revealed in a recent interview on the Talking Pictures podcast that she's once again engaged in developing the script for Rogue Squadron.

Jenkins, known for her work on the Wonder Woman franchise, explained that the revival of Rogue Squadron came about following the dissolution of her plans for Wonder Woman 3 at Warner Bros. and DC Studios. "When Wonder Woman 3 then went away, Lucasfil
title: DC "Aren't Interested" In Wonder Woman Movies For Now, Director Says

description:
Star Wars Battlefront: Classic Collection is now available for purchase, but Aspyr's compilation of the two multiplayer games from long (long!) ago has been criticized for launching with multiplayer issues and bugs. On Steam, various reviews from users claim the game is almost unplayable in its present state.

Users claim the game initially launched with only three 64-player servers for the thousands of people who purchased the game on PC and console. Aspyr did increase server capacity, but this only served to highlight other glaring issues in the Battlefront collection.

"Was only able to join one Heroes vs. Villains match and the Hero's side was completely broken," Kamaji wrote in a Steam user review. "No one could join the Hero's team which resulted in no one to fight against.
title: Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection's Launch Isn't Going Smoothly

description:
NASA and SpaceX are celebrating today, as SpaceX successfully launched its Starship into outer space in another step in NASA's plan to put humans back on the Moon and eventually to Mars. The ship broke up during re-entry and crashed into the Indian Ocean, and the flight plan was not a total success.

This was the third Starship test flight; a previous test of ship riding the biggest rocket ever created ended quite differently, as it began to spin and later exploded not long after launching.

NASA is doling out money to SpaceX and other private companies to work on technology to get humans to the Moon as part of the Artemis program. This latest Starship test launch, which had no humans on board, is the latest push toward that goal in the testing and preparation process
title: Rocket Launch Sends Ship To Space In Bid To Get Back To Moon, Explodes On Re-Entry

description:
This year is the 30th anniversary of the first Crow movie famously, and tragically, starring Brandon Lee in the titular role. Now, Bill Skarsg√•rd is donning the facepaint for the character in a reboot, picking up the baton from Lee and Mark Dacascos, who played the character on a TV series adaptation of the film.

The first images of Skarsgard as the Crow arrived online last month, but didn't make the best first impression with franchise fans. Of course, many were still willing to give it a chance. Well, we have our first trailer as Skarsgard's Draven takes his revenge on the drug dealers and criminals that took his life, as well as the life of his fianc√©e Shelly (FKA twigs) while Post Malone's "Take What You Want" blasts th
title: Bill Skarsg√•rd Takes Flight In First New Crow Trailer

description: Ahead of the release of Alone in the Dark, THQ Nordic sent over this mysterious puzzle box to tie in with the game. So who better to take on the challenge than Chris and Adam, two of GameSpot's dumbest and British-est video producers?
title: Two British Idiots Open A Puzzle Box | Alone In The Dark

description:
This year's finalists for the Strong Museum's Video Game Hall of Fame have been announced, highlighting another selection of influential titles. Like previous years, the nominees include games from across multiple eras, including classics like Asteroids, Elite, and Metroid.

Released in 1979, Asteroids made the list for its challenging gameplay and intense sound effects, while Elite was praised for being an early pioneer of 3D graphics. Nintendo's Metroid made the cut thanks to innovative gameplay, an alien atmosphere, and a memorable soundtrack. Moving to the '90s, the Strong Museum highlighted Myst for its puzzles and adoption of CD-ROM technology, Resident Evil for popularizing the survival-horror genre, and Tony Hawk's Pro Skater for bringing the sport and culture of skateboarding into the mainstream.

Guitar Hero mixed licensed music and plastic instruments to create a new wave of rhythm-based gaming with wide appeal when it first launched in 2005, You Don't
title: 2024 Video Game Hall Of Fame Finalists Include Metroid, Resident Evil, And Guitar Hero

description:
Just like Emperor Palpatine, the Star Wars: Rogue Squadron movie might not be dead after all. That's because Wonder Woman director Patty Jenkins says that she's back at work on the script for the film.

As spotted by Collider, Jenkins--who also wrote and helmed Wonder Woman 1984--said on the Talking Pictures podcast that she has an agreement with Lucasfilm for Star Wars: Rogue Squadron. With Wonder Woman 3 not happening, the director says she has returned to a galaxy far, far away.

"When [Wonder Woman 3] went away, Lucasfilm and I were like, 'Oh, we gotta finish this deal.' We finished the deal right as the strike was happening," Jenkins said
title: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron Is Back On, According To Patty Jenkins

description:
PlayFusion has released the first gameplay trailer for Ascendant Infinity, an upcoming squad-based competitive shooter in which teams need to contend in battlegrounds that are constantly changing and evolving. The studio refers to this type of game as an "adaption shooter," marketing Ascendant Infinity as the first of its kind.

The gameplay trailer showcases how Ascendant Infinity works in practice, with four teams of three all fighting over the same objective--find, protect, and extract biocores--but each match changes the flow of combat by adjusting the landscape of the map, the layout of extraction points, and the environmental threats that players have to contend with.

In the trailer, you can see teams having to fight off dangerous monsters who throw already frantic firefights into chaos, collected biocores transforming players into shirtless hulking el
title: Ascendant Infinity Gets First Gameplay Trailer, Featuring Neon-Drenched, '80s-Infused Mayhem

description:
A return to Lumiose City!


Pokemon Legends: Z-A made a surprise appearance at the end of the latest Pokemon Presents video, as the debut trailer offered a brief look at the franchise's return to the Kalos region and, more specifically, Lumiose City. Packed within the brief two-minute video are multiple Pokemon, and finding them all requires a keen eye.

We've located 29 Pokemon in the first teaser trailer, and we've listed them all here. As more information comes out about the game leading up to its 2025 release on Nintendo Switch, we will update this gallery with every Pokemon you'll find in Pokemon Legends: Z-A.


Pikachu


The famous electric mouse is the first Pokemon we s
title: Every Confirmed Pokemon For Pokemon Legends Z-A So Far

description:
Embracer Group and Saber Interactive have officially parted, as a group of private investors purchased the game developer in a deal currently valued at $247 million. Private investors in the Beacon Interactive group--an organization founded and controlled by Saber Interactive co-founder Matthew Karch--purchased the company, and Embracer added that it'll also cease all operations in Russia.

This deal will see Saber Interactive retain control of several of its studios, while Embracer Group will hold onto the rest. Nimble Giant, 3D Realms, Sandbox Strategies, and several other studios will remain with Saber Interactive, while Embracer Group will retain studios like Aspyr and Beamdog.

Saber Interactive also had the option to purchase Metro developer 4A Games and Pinball FX developer Zen Studios--and new CEO Matt Karch has reportedly already done so via stock options--increasing the true value of the purchase price to around $500 million, according to
title: Embracer Group And Saber Interactive Part Ways In Deal Reportedly Worth $500 Million

description:
Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire releases in theaters on March 29, and ahead of that, tickets for the absolutely bonkers-sounding film are now on sale.

You can buy a ticket via Fandango right now for showtimes beginning with Thursday evening previews on March 28. Use the link below to grab a ticket today.
title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire Tickets Are Now On Sale

description:
The Flood are arguably the most terrifying sights in the Halo franchise, but there's a new cosmetic in Halo Infinite that's coming for that title. Meet the Wendigo armor kit for the Chimera armor core, as seen below.

Available in the Halo Infinite shop, this cyclops-themed suit features a metallic skull sinking into the chest piece, and most obviously, a huge eye on the helmet with a green sclera and pink iris. The rest of the armor is mainly gray with pops of bright pink. Needless to say, the cosmetic will definitely stand out in contrast to more traditional Spartan suits in multiplayer matches.

As you can see, we've had our üëÅÔ∏è on you for some time now...
Head to the Shop to acquire the Wendigo armor kit for your CHIMERA armor core.#HaloCyberShowdownIII
title: Halo Infinite Gets Maybe Its Most Horrifying Cosmetic Yet

title: Monster Hunter Stories Collection Preorders Are Live At Amazon

description:
Sony's Madame Web flopped at the box office. One of its stars, Sydney Sweeney, has now responded to the film's dismal performance, and she doesn't sound too fazed by it.

"I was just hired as an actress in it, so I was just along for the ride for whatever was going to happen," Sweeney told The Los Angeles Times.

That's all she had to say on the subject. Sweeney played Julia Cornwall/Spider-Woman in Madame Web alongside Dakota Johnson as Madame Web herself.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Sydney Sweeney Responds To Madame Web Box Office Flop

description:
Back in 2022 Discord added Activities for voice calls, a set of watch-together tools and simple games that users could engage with together in a call. Now, even more developers will have the chance to add their own games and apps to Activities with the release of the Embedded App SDK.

Activities initially released as an exclusive feature for Discord Nitro subscribers, and included a handful of simple games that were developed by the Discord team. Last year it was opened up for all Discord users, and its library of games have expanded to include third-party developed games like Gartic Phone and the online Catan-like Colonist.

When the Embedded App SDK release
title: Discord Invites Devs To Make Games That Are Playable Directly In Its App

description:
The games industry isn't in the best shape at the moment, with cost-cutting measures leading to layoffs, studio closures, and game cancellations--and there are few major titles on the way to shore up sales. In an interview with GamesIndustry.biz, industry analyst Mat Piscatella has said that GTA 6 might end up being an incredibly important release for the industry at large.

Piscatella, who works for tracking firm Circana, says 2024 isn't looking great for the games industry, with overall spending expected to dip by anywhere from 2% to 10%, depending on how optimistic you are.

"There's so much uncertainty when you look at the sales data or look to project this year," Piscatella says. "There's uncertainty around the hardware. There's uncertainty about the content. Who the hell's making the games?"
title: GTA 6 Is Most Important Game Release In Industry's History, Analyst Says
